panel.label: Shirt
panel.name: Shirt
panel.text: Put on a new shirt by dragging one from your inventory to your avatar. Alternately, you create a new one from scratch and wear it.
You do not have permission to modify this wearable.

button.name: Create New
button.label: Create a new shirt and wear it

text.name: AvatarHeightText
text.tool_tip: This is your avatar body height, i.e. not counting shoes or Hover parameter.

text.name: HeightTextM
text.tool_tip: This is your avatar body height (in meters), i.e. not counting shoes or Hover parameter.

text.name: HeightTextI
text.tool_tip: This is your avatar body height (for metric-system-impaired people :-D), i.e. not counting shoes or Hover parameter.

text.name: ShoesHeightText
text.tool_tip: This is the height of the shoes plateform (if any), to add to the above avatar body height when wearing and counting shoes.

text.name: ShoesText
text.tool_tip: This is the height of the shoes plateform (if any), to add to the above avatar body height when wearing and counting shoes.

text.name: PelvisToFootHeightText
text.tool_tip: This is the distance between your avatar's pelvis and soles (feet soles or shoes soles when worn). It is useful to know it when playing kneeling, crawling, sitting or laying on ground animations designed for a different shape, with a different pelvis to soles value (you might then need to change the Avatar Z offset while playing such animations).

text.name: PelvisToFootText
text.tool_tip: This is the distance between your avatar's pelvis and soles (feet soles or shoes soles when worn). It is useful to know it when playing kneeling, crawling, sitting or laying on ground animations designed for a different shape, with a different pelvis to soles value (you might then need to change the Avatar Z offset while playing such animations).
